title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.1 - Opportunity to be heard; institution of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.1 - Opportunity to be heard; institution of proceedings

State Regulations
(a) The commission shall not deny any
application for a license or registration, nor revoke, cancel or suspend any
license or registration, without giving the party in interest an opportunity to
be heard. (b) Proceedings to revoke, cancel or suspend a license or registration may be instituted by the commission
on its own initiative or on complaint of any person, including any public
official or agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
